question: Display chefs and servers fluent in Spanish.
sql_query1:
SELECT Chefs.name
FROM Chefs
WHERE Chefs.language = "Spanish"
UNION
SELECT Servers.name
FROM Servers
WHERE Servers.language = "Spanish"
sql_query2:
SELECT Chefs.name
FROM Chefs
UNION
SELECT Servers.name
FROM Servers
WHERE Servers.language = "Spanish"
interpretation1: Which chefs and servers are fluent in Spanish?
interpretation2: List all chefs and also display servers fluent in Spanish.
